item.title: CORS bypass - Funny trick to get through the same-origin-header
item.description: If you are confused on where to start or wasted a lot of your time in getting started with Hyperledger Composer, you should read this article. My co-worker, Varun has explained it in such a simple way that anyone can understand it. What is Business Network Definition? The Business Network Definition is the core definition that holds the Hyperledger Composerâ€™s programming model. In short, it controls the model definition, the relationship between them, the access control over them and the actions that could be performed on/with them.
